feat: Add Manual Image Edit and Custom Word List translations to crossword and word-guess apps

CROSSWORD APP:
- Added Custom Word List with Clues feature translations (all 11 languages)
- Fixed hardcoded English text in crossword.html
- Translation keys: customWordList, useCustomWords, enterWordsAndClues, etc.
- Format: WORD:Clue text (e.g., APPLE:A red or green fruit)

WORD GUESS APP:
- Added Custom Word List feature translations (all 11 languages)
- Translation keys: customWordList, useCustomWords, enterWords, etc.

WORD SCRAMBLE APP:
- Added Custom Word List feature translations (all 11 languages)

WORDSEARCH APP:
- Added Custom Word List feature translations (all 11 languages)

All translations created to sound natural in each language:
EN, DE, FR, ES, IT, PT (Brazilian), NL, SV, DA, NO, FI

Files updated in REFERENCE folders (source of truth):
- REFERENCE APPS/crossword.html (removed hardcoded text)
- REFERENCE TRANSLATIONS/translations-crossword.js
- REFERENCE TRANSLATIONS/translations-word-guess.js
- REFERENCE TRANSLATIONS/translations-word-scramble-complete.js
- REFERENCE TRANSLATIONS/translations-wordsearch-complete.js

Deployed to production: 2025-12-09

ü§ñ Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
